lender.name: Dorothy
lender.loan_because: this is a great organization.
lender.occupational_info: I work at an Insurance Company in New York City

lender.name: Alec
lender.loan_because: I want to help poorer people then me start their busniesses.
lender.occupational_info:
Since I am a multi billionare with way too much money to count, I've started burning money! it gets cold in Washington sometimes...
PS. I am a student :] im kidding i just like helping people. :]

lender.name: ilan elson-schwab
lender.loan_because:
Instead of buying traditional presents that people often may not want or need, I prefer to put the money to good use and buy them Kiva gift certificates.
After their loan is paid back, they can then choose whether to withdraw the cash or keep on loaning (which is surprisingly addictive I've found).
lender.occupational_info: Management consulting

lender.name: Marisa
lender.loan_because: If you give a man a fish you feed him for a day, If you teach a man to fish you feed him for a lifetime.

lender.name: Nikki & Grace
lender.loan_because: ... the goal in life should be focusing on others, not focusing on self.

lender.name: dorothy
lender.loan_because: I was given a Kiva gift certificate and I believe in providing a chance for a person\'s creative instincts to flower
lender.occupational_info: One of my greatest joys has been to encourage young people

lender.name: Kit
lender.loan_because: I want to help people build good lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who are in business school do their paperwork so that they can work legally and earn in the US while they study. I also help professors pay vendors, buy items such as books and software, and buy subscriptions.

lender.name: Dorothy & Gordon
lender.loan_because: People-to-people small loans is a wonderful idea.

lender.name: Kwh
lender.loan_because: anything helps
lender.occupational_info: Lots of work

lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: its sooo easy!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a science teacher.

lender.name: sydney
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in someone elses life.

lender.name: Ryan & Chrissy
lender.loan_because: We've seen some of these parts of the world first hand. Ryan's also studied business and economics; and micro credit is a key aspect of getting a developing economy moving.
lender.occupational_info: Owner of a small in-home tutoring business & high school biology teacher

lender.name: matthew
lender.loan_because: I have the oppertunity

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: my grandfather helped me once and said not to repay him but to promise to help those who need help like I once did. Now that I can help others acheive their goal, I hope that one day they will help others.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: i\'m hella awesome

lender.name: peter
lender.loan_because: Hopefully it makes a difference and stimulates small scale economic growth and well-being.
lender.occupational_info: I am a hospital based general medicine physician. I take care of adults with all types of medical conditions warranting hospitalization.

lender.name: Gabriel
lender.loan_because: I care and I want to make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Emily and Claire
lender.loan_because: We want to help people!
lender.occupational_info: We are in the sixth grade and the third grade.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because:
...although relief aid is urgently needed to help people stay out of the grave, microfinance is the best way to help people get on their feet.
The high success rate is amazing because it proves that lending to even the most disadvantaged is less risky than investing on wall street :)
The entrepeneurs inspire me because they make me feel like I can exceed my limits as they beat all odds.
lender.occupational_info: I design computer security for so that companies can do business with without being victimized by criminals.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I was given a kiva gift certificate for Christmas, and I thought it was a splendid idea. I hope this small gift will make a big difference in someone\'s life.
lender.occupational_info: I organize special events for the city I live in.

lender.name: Gideon
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves

lender.name: ana
lender.loan_because: i want to help make a better life for future generations =)
lender.occupational_info: college student. peace advocate. just trying to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Sherri
lender.occupational_info: I work as a nurse in a hospital in my community

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I believe it's why i'm here

lender.name: jon
lender.loan_because: It\'s fun.I like to see hard working people have the tools to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Survey holes in the ground,mostly oil and gas wells.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: It all started with a gift certificate...I think this website is a great initiative to help people setting up their own business. Moreover, I think micro financing is very helpful in improving the position of women.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an assistant professor at the University of Groningen, Netherlands. I teach and do research in the area of econometrics and statistics.

lender.name: Jussi
lender.loan_because: I believe it is an effective way to help our world.

lender.name: Tim May
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. These folks are working hard to make their lives better for themselves and family. They are willing to take personal risks to accomplish their goals. I can offer some assistance through these loans. Once successful maybe these entrepeneurs will do the same for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: commercial banking

lender.name: maxwell
lender.loan_because: i need loan to enable me to help the women in my village to get a petty tracing market forthem to have their daily bread.the live here is very terrible and people are dieing because of hungar and poverty i my village called BOASO in the atwima nwabiagya district of Ashanti Region.
lender.occupational_info: i am selling second hand clothes and doing small scale farming like agricultural crops like tomatoes and pepper farming.\r\ni wish to expand this vision to be a big enterpreneur and bring livilihood in my community.

lender.name: Lilith
lender.loan_because: because i can
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who believe in the joy and power of learning and working as a team to create something.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: So few opportunities are available to touch the lives of others. A small sacrifice on my part, may be of great assistance to someone trying to build a better life &/or succeed in their choosen profession.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Surgery during Open Heart procedures.

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: people deserve a chance to improve their lives. Hand-up not hand-out.
lender.occupational_info: I keep people asleep, comfortable, and alive while they have surgery.

lender.name: Terri
lender.loan_because: It is the gift of giving, what an awesome opportunity to help these in need of a successful life
lender.occupational_info: I am a school bus driver, I transport children to and from school safely.

lender.name: Katie
lender.occupation: Marketing Director for World Vision in Metro NY

lender.name: Bruce and Sharon
lender.loan_because: We have enough in life and want others to have the same opportunities that we have had.
lender.occupational_info: We design gardens for the enjoyment of our clients and the public. We believe in sustainably creating beautiful spaces.

lender.name: Farooq
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others achieve their dreams. By providing loans, I help one person, who in return can help his/her family, who with their success help their community. I believe this is a starting point for a cycle of goodness.

lender.name: Kathryn/ Houston, Texas
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do! When we each help to lift another up we all rise as a result.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people the art of relaxation through meditation, massage and guided imagery.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I really enjoy getting to see the difference that these loans make in people's lives. I find helping these small businesses receive the capital they need to succeed very fulfilling.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: My brother gave me a gift certificate for Christmas. It was such a wonderful idea!
lender.occupational_info: I teach children to read.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: We found out about Kiva the day after Christmas 2006 and are very pleased to be able to support this very important cause.

lender.name: Gomez
lender.loan_because: It is important to help one another...\r\nwe are all connected
lender.occupational_info: I sing to whoever will listen

lender.name: Owen
lender.loan_because: You can help others help themselves, and then when you get the money back -- do it again!
lender.occupational_info: I love Jesus!

lender.name: Sue
lender.occupation: I pay commissions to sales people
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good. Plus, I love reading the stories of these entrepreneurs and I am impressed with their hearts, their determination and their smiling grace. (well, they don't all smile but you know what I mean!)

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: providing access to credit and supporting the development of stable financial institutions is neccessary for developing countries to improve their standard of living.
lender.occupational_info: I go to class :)

lender.name: AustraliansAbroad.com
lender.loan_because: We should
lender.occupational_info: Australians Abroad is a community of Australians living overseas, or with friends or families living overseas. We are happy to support Kiva!!! Many members are individual Kiva lenders.

lender.name: Tom
lender.occupational_info: I was an accountant

lender.name: Tawni
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a budgeting and finance officer for a global health non-profit. I help the organization budget grants and contracts funded by government agencies and foundations.

lender.name: Phil

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: Helping people who want to help themselves is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: My work is centered around giving hospitals, clinics, doctors and people the tools to help them stay healthy and manage their healthcare when they aren't.

lender.name: Hugh
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I broker sales and leases of real estate.

lender.loan_because: It is a good idea

lender.name: Mother Ship Ramirez
lender.loan_because: bailamos todos Hanky Panky

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I believe capitalism is the key to sustainability for many underdeveloped countries.

lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start a small farm. Farmers are some of the hardest working people in the world and helping them helps us all.

lender.name: Millard and Bonita
lender.loan_because: I (millard) worked in Peshawar, Pakistan as a Peace Corps teacher from 1962-64; I'd like to support positive action in that country.
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I are retired and now live in Mexico. My work was in education and social services. My wife worked in business.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: My brother gave us gift certificates to Kiva for Christmas presents. What a great idea!

lender.name: Andrea, Isaac and Alec
lender.loan_because: It\'s a great idea! My sons used some of the money that they received as Christmas gifts, and we made choices together about whom to loan money to.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English in a public school, and my sons are high school students.

lender.name: Carol & Anna
lender.loan_because: we have been blessed with the good fortune of being born in a wealthy nation. We are thrilled to be able to make a small contribution to give others a chance for a better life.
lender.occupational_info: Carol drives a city bus equipped to transport disabled people in wheelchairs. She takes them to medical appointments, shopping, church, and visiting relatives and friends. Anna works as a medical clerk at a local hospital. We live in a city of 300,000 people in Ontario, Canada.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: To be honest it makes me feel good that i can help other people who are in need. The people i have loaned to have repaid as scheduled enabling me to loan to others.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired. Have been attempting to restore a circa 1900 farmhouse for the past 13 years, many more to go.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: It feels good knowing I'm helping someone across the world.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: I'm self-employed and feel fortunate to be able to make a living doing what I love to do. While not rich, I have all the comforts I require and wish to help others achieve the same.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: it's important to help others when possible.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school, spend time with friends, and play piano.

lender.name: Moses
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate to have the privileges that I do, and am committing this year to using them to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach students aged 15-18 about science (physics and astronomy).

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: i have been given much.

lender.name: Paul Tourigny
lender.loan_because: This personalized system lets me see where the money goes.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I believe we should share with others who may not have the same opportunities.

lender.name: Ardith
lender.loan_because: This was a wonderful Christmas present from my son and family. We all believe that we can make the world a better place by helping others...

lender.loan_because: My brother in law gave me a gift certificate as a gift for Christmas. Seems like a great gift idea.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a non-for-profit recreation center in the office.

lender.loan_because: We all need help at some point in our lives.
lender.occupational_info: We like to help people just as much as people have helped us.

lender.loan_because: It feels wonderful to help other small business owners.
lender.occupational_info: I design and create artistic apparel and home decor.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I believe the way out of global conflict is through reducing poverty. I particularly believe that motivated people, given a bit of capital, can have huge impacts on their communities, and my overall hope.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies figure out how to use information technology more effectively.

lender.name: Karen & Bailey, the Pom
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to share and to learn about others.

lender.loan_because: I feel that it is the right thing to do. Our country has so much and we should do what we can to to assist others who do not enjoy the advantage we have.
lender.occupational_info: I am an independent consultant, assisting companies with their health and safety initiatives and programs through program audits and process development.

lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: why not?

lender.name: Gordon
lender.loan_because: I like people and would like them to have a little better life than would otherwise be possible.
lender.occupational_info: I was an engineer in the mining and construction industries. Since retiring I have been busy with grand children.

lender.name: marcia
lender.loan_because: Kiva works. What a great way to feel that I can actually make a difference in a person\'s life. I plan to pass this concept on and to get more involved..
lender.occupational_info: I am a loan officer - I help people to obtain a loan for the purchase of a new home. Business is very slow in California so maybe I will keep loaning just now to people in other countries...

lender.name: SwissMiss
lender.loan_because: I believe in people helping others.

lender.name: Melvin
lender.loan_because: I want to be involved and a part of a worldwide solution to end poverty.

lender.name: Carmela
lender.loan_because: it\'s a proven way to help people improve their lives. I also want my children to believe they can make a difference in the world and to see that difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help educate Americans about the connections between the way they live and the health of our planet.

lender.name: Ken and Kirstin
lender.loan_because: Our Aunt told us she would like us to loan to a woman\'s business as a present to her for Christmas
lender.occupational_info: We are students

lender.name: Arundhati Roy Supporters
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info:
WeRoy.org is a site that helps to distribute a free 60-minute documentary film called "We", which features the words of award winning author, peace activist and humanitarian, Arundhati Roy. The film can be downloaded and viewed online for free. However, for those who would like a television quality version, a DVD disc is also available for as low as a $5 donation. After production and shipping costs, we have a little left over from each donation. In the spirit of Ms. Roy's humanitarian work, that extra change is pooled and used to directly help many of the people she fights for in the developing world, through Kiva.
"Today the world is run by three of the most secretive institutions in the world: The International Monetary Fund, the World Bank, and the World Trade Organization, all three of which, in turn, are dominated by the U.S. Their decisions are made in secret. The people who head them are appointed behind closed doors. Nobody really knows anything about them, their politics, their beliefs, their intentions. Nobody elected them. Nobody said they could make decisions on our behalf." - Arundhati Roy

lender.name: stephen
lender.loan_because: we are all one......

lender.name: Inga
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a travel writer who brings the adventure of exploring different cultures to independent travelers.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I should.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large telco in IT I'm an expat Aussie living and working in Canada

lender.name: Paul and Pamela
lender.loan_because: It is such a nice way to reach out to people in other countries to help them achieve their goals.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I want to help those less fortunate than I am, and to be part of a plan to enable them to make their lives better by being productive and independent.
lender.occupational_info: Retired from the telephone company

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: Having travelled extensively in Africa in the 1970's and having followed the failure of government to government aid, I see micro-lending as the most-likely-to-succeed method of bringing these countries out of poverty
lender.occupational_info: I help people achieve their financial goals

lender.name: Bobby
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I enforce the laws which were created by the government of my country

lender.name: Howard
lender.loan_because: I want to help others create an opportunity to create a better world and firmly believe Micro finance is a more effective tool for fighting poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I support businesses around the world by helping them market their products and services online.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I make a modest living and offering loans is a way to contribute effectively within my means. The elimination of poverty is a matter of justice.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office at a major university in the United States. I buy and organize books from around the world, particularly books from the former Soviet Union and Latin America. I am also a graduate student, learning how to teach English to immigrants and refugees in the US.

lender.name: paul
lender.loan_because: Poverty is a threat to peace. Microfinancing is the ideal way to help the poor.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired Red Cross representative in Europe and Asia. Curently I am a speaker and writer on world peace issues and the Geneva Conventions.

lender.name: Haley
lender.loan_because: Embrace change Help others Treat all people with respect

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others, but I've thought long and hard about the best ways to do so. The greatest good is achieved by Capitalistic means and Kiva is one way to put that miracle into practice.
lender.occupational_info: I teach ways to invest to distance education students via the Internet.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. So little can do so much.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a painter and printmaker using Asian materials and working in an abstract style. My painting comes from an inner process and is connected to Zen Buddhism

lender.name: Caleb
lender.loan_because: seems an entirely worthwhile idea

lender.name: Ariel
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses to compete effectively and inspire their employees.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: A freind recommended that I try this as an alternate way to make the world a better place to live

lender.name: Lea Wheeler
lender.loan_because: I received the money as a gift from a friend

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: I have travelled and understand the difficulties that people in developing countries face.
lender.occupational_info: global account management..electronics

lender.loan_because: It helps others help themselves.

lender.name: Becca
lender.loan_because: I want to reach out and make a little difference, now.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: A little can make a big difference
lender.occupational_info: I write books about personal finance and I sell houses

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I believe it's important to actively participate in eliminating poverty... this is one small thing I can do to help ...
lender.occupational_info: I facilitate a program and run day to day operations for a team that serves people living with severe & persistent mental illness.

lender.name: Claudiu
lender.loan_because: I can. This is the most natural and satisfying way to help people to help themselves. It is also potentially an exciting and effective way to influence business activity around the world, one microloan at a time. Kiva is fantastic!
lender.occupational_info: As an entrepreneur I understand what it takes to start a business from zero; to build a business where there was nothing before; to embrace a work ethic that is not limited to regular working hours. My company is at http://www.InformationSecurityCanada.com and my work is entirely focused on helping organizations and governments to protect their most valuable assets: people and information. It is the best way I know how to make a positive difference on a bigger scale. It is also a reason why the Kiva model appeals so much to me. I welcome your email (Claudiu@InformaticaSecurity.com).

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because:
How could I not?
Everyone deserves a break and because I have been blessed in this life. Helping people help themselves and their countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am a program assistant at a junior college www.evc.edu. I am a student www.sjsu.edu and I volunteer at our animal shelter www.sanjoseanimals.com

lender.loan_because: It is important to help others in times of need.

lender.name: Tia Terri
lender.loan_because: I want to help improve lives of others by lending a hand to help people work smarter to be successful. I am especially interested in assisting people who want to do the work to make their lives better by their own dedication and hard work.

lender.occupational_info: I teach young children and help adults learn English. I also work in my local county helping people who have emotional problems.

lender.loan_because: Helping others to help themselves is so important.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I like helping others.

lender.name: Annabianca
lender.loan_because: I\'m happy and I can help and make happy someone that has a dream!
lender.occupational_info: I study Art Managenent, I work with children in a museum and I collaborate with young artists

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because:
I am a pastor therefore in order to subsidize my salary and not to burden the church I sell men and women clothes. My business was doing extremely well in AL from 1998 to 2002. However, when I moved to North Carolina (to obtain my Master of Divinity) my clients dropped and I have not been able to get enough money to buy inventory. 

I need a loan in order for me to have a website so I can reach my out of town customers (200+.) I also need a stock onhand so I can obtain new customers in NC.
lender.occupational_info: I am a pastor of a small church and the tithes from my business help the church and with aloan I can help people obtain the clothing they desire at a reasonable cost.

lender.name: Claus + Steffi
lender.loan_because: It is a great idea

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: My wife and I would like to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: My background is working in the IT industry (network administrator) and my wife worked in the Seniors Health Care administration industry

lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: Worldwide Logistics Provider

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life with more than enough. It is my pleasure to be able to give that same gift to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I am no longer working full - time but I still volunteer in the church. I was a church musician for over 25 years. Leading worship and directing choirs.

lender.name: Rose and Leo
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe that microlending and coaching about business opportunities is the way to help people out of poverty. Without organizations such as KIVA, they won't have a chance going through regular lenders.

lender.name: Shalini
lender.loan_because: It matters.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people around the world to make maps of their communities and help them participate in making the big decisions that affect their lives and environments.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student, studying communications and sociology.

lender.name: Colin
lender.occupational_info: I am now retired but I used to write the instructions that told computers what to do.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: All people are my brothers and sisters. I'm not rich, but I have enough money to have a decent life and I want the same for everyone.

lender.name: Phyllis
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I like to help entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Berkeley, CA

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: It is great knowing who I am lending to, and watching the business grow and progress.
lender.occupational_info: I teach economics to college and university undergraduates. I especially love to teach introductory courses to students who have not taken econ before. I am very lucky to be in an environment where new ideas are respected, valued, and shared among people. I learn at least as much from my students as they do from me.

lender.name: Lawrie Savage
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great way to give an opportunity to hard working people in developing countries. It gives them a chance to improve their lives and the lives of their families in a way that should be much more satisfying and sustainable than mere charity.
lender.occupational_info: Consultant who helps governments in emerging market countries to modernize their laws and other procedures designed to ensure that the country\'s financial institutions and pension funds provide reliable security for the individuals and businesses in the country. (Picture is of my daughter at Moraine Lake, in the Canadian Rockies near Calgary)

lender.name: D.R.
lender.loan_because: I want to help less fortunate people realize their dream.
lender.occupational_info: High paced and varied

lender.name: Barney & Shannon
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Shirley & Rick
lender.loan_because: We loan because we heard about how valuable such loans can be, especially through the work of Muhammad Yunus. It is one of the most exciting ways we know of for helping others. Children from well-off families should all be given a gift certificate to get them started early in life.
lender.occupational_info: Rick is an artist. He does painting, photography, video art, poetry & journalism.

lender.name: jeremy
lender.occupational_info: research in a inorganic chemistry lab

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: It's good to help others bootstrap their way up - it helps them and their local economy both!

lender.name: Bud
lender.occupational_info: Take in homeless animals and find good homes for them.

lender.name: Sharon Teklu
lender.loan_because: I believe in making a difference in the life of the one's who need it most. As Norman B. Rice once said "Dare to reach out your hand into the darkness, to pull another hand into the light".

lender.name: cpr
lender.loan_because: small business makes the world go around

lender.name: Kati
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing for Americans to do because we have so much.
lender.occupational_info: Teacher, translator, indexer

lender.name: Spike
lender.loan_because: I don\'t have to.

lender.name: Mathews Family
lender.loan_because: we can and it's the right thing to do!

lender.name: Mimi
lender.loan_because: it brings me joy!!!

lender.name: Nancy & Dale
lender.loan_because: We are happy to be able to loan people the financial assistance they determine they need so that they can make choices, support themselves, their family, and feel successful. This results in becoming an asset and valued contributing member of the community.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of microfinance and think it provides a form of sustainable development.
lender.occupational_info: Training to be a radiologist.

lender.name: Corey and Katie
lender.loan_because: It feels good and they are fun gifts to share with others.
lender.occupational_info: Corey works in nonprofit technology helping organizations raise money and awareness on the Internet. Katie is a massage therapist, helping people heal with her her hands.

lender.name: Michigan Trese
lender.loan_because: Banks don\'t like giving mico loans. Hardworking people deserve a chance to better their situation.

lender.name: Malou & Alonzo
lender.loan_because: A real meaningful way to help... Impressed with the loan repayment record of past borrowers.

lender.name: Henry Harlow
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate to have been born in the USA. I am committed to building the economies of the rest of the world so everyone can enjoy a better quality of life. I think small business is one of the most viable ways to improve the quality of life inside and outside the USA.
lender.occupational_info: I teach attorneys how to increase their income while they reduce their work hours so they can serve their clients better than ever.

lender.name: Marcy
lender.loan_because: I live and work in a developing country, and I see how just a little money/confidence in work ability makes a big difference in a family's way of life.

lender.name: scootssalutes
lender.loan_because: Diversity is a great thing!

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help disabled people prove to the U.S. government that they are eligible for disability payments.

lender.name: R&R
lender.occupational_info: check out www.innocenceproject.org

lender.name: Clifford & Trish
lender.loan_because: The world can\'t be a good place if we have so much and everybody else has so little.We want to help people that are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work in one of the hardest businesses to make money. I work long intense hours and manage many diverging viewpoints.I am a commercial electrical project manager.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I don\'t deserve the money that I have any more than these entrepreneurs deserve not to have the chance to provide for themselves and their families with dignity.

lender.name: lowell
lender.loan_because: I believe in the vaue of a helping hand for hardworking people
lender.occupational_info: I lend money to build buildings

lender.name: Aaron & Sarah
lender.occupational_info: He designs buildings, and she helps people with mental illness.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: Because it will overjoy me to see this business flourish and know that I contributed to making it happen.

lender.name: jiseon
lender.loan_because: I wanna help who needs help. even though I can do only this. and I believe they will gain a little hope and get warm.
lender.occupational_info: the train signal is to control train traffiic automatically. you can reckon that is automatic control system related with trains.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Clich, but it is better to teach to fish than to give someone fish. In this case I believe this is an amazing way to help people to build their own environment into a self sustaining economy.
lender.occupational_info: I work to build software applications for use by businesses.

lender.name: Vinod
lender.loan_because: We like to see our money make a difference in people's lives

lender.name: John & Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: hopefully it helps.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I loan because I love seeing other people succeed.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I have been intrigued with the idea of microlending for years, but until I read about Kiva in GOOD magazine I didn\'t know I could do it myself - I love the idea of being able to help alter the roots of poverty instead of just targeting the symptoms of poverty with charity.
lender.occupational_info: I research hunger and poverty in the US and am currently working on my dissertation researching how social support from friends and family affect hunger.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I want women to have more economic power and personal power in the world. I am grateful to be able to my small part to make more opportunities for my sisters around the globe.
lender.occupational_info: I\'m a Life Coach. I help people change their lives and find their authentic voice and personal power; teach communication skills and believe in people. I used to be a nonsmokers\' rights advocate and worked to eliminate secondhand smoke from public places through policy change; now I help individuals and couples make healthy changes in their lives.

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: I was given the gift to loan.......
lender.occupational_info: I teach children in San Diego, California. Currently I teach 5th grade.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I would like some of my income to go to helping others especially as my US tax dollars are often spent on causes that I do not agree with.
lender.occupational_info: I assist hospitalized patients with corrdination of their health care.

lender.name: Zach Hoffman
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do. I am 16 years old and fortunate enough to live in the United States where I can go to school and have the opportunity to be whatever I want to be. To whom much is given, much is expected.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Sophomore in High School. I go to classes every day and practice sports after school. I want to go to college and then to Law School.

lender.name: Anne & Mike Woods
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping people help themselves, and this seems like a great way to do that.
lender.occupational_info: Patent lawyer is like a middleman between inventors and the public. She/he helps to protect the inventions while making them available for the public to use.

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: I received the money as a wonderful gift certificate allowing me to help someone in the world to have a little better life.
lender.occupational_info: I work with an interfaith group that advocates for children and families in the state of California,USA.

lender.name: cem
lender.loan_because: I like helping individuals. This program gives me hope in the human race.

lender.name: Jenny & Chris
lender.loan_because: Grassroots lending to specific people. A valid way an individual can activate positve change around the world.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: this is such a delightful way to help folks and feel personally connected. \r\n\r\nThanks to Kiva for making it possible.

lender.name: sandeep sonny
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good....
lender.occupational_info: im a doctor

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I run my own business and I want to support others to realize that same dream.

lender.name: Rachele
lender.loan_because: It's a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people to get healthy and stay healthy, naturally.

lender.name: Walter
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to be a blessing
lender.occupational_info: preacher, healer

lender.name: Tommy
lender.occupational_info: I am a 18 year old High School student

lender.name: Jaki & Paul
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help people outside of our community.

lender.name: Rosetta
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance at a better life.

lender.name: Putty & Ollie
lender.loan_because: This is such a great idea, people helping themselves. And when they pay back the loan, they're helping out the next guy too.

lender.name: Wedge
lender.loan_because: I think that we, in America, should look out to people in impoverished places. I have traveled to other countries and seen how people live. I want to help in any way possible and I want these people to live life to the fullest. I am not rich but just above being in need and I still would not be able to live like these poor people. Americans suck it up and help the world we arent the only people in this world and I want you to see that. To these people who donate: you have my deepest gratitude and to the recipeints: I hope with my heart you make it to your goal.

lender.name: Zac
lender.loan_because: Because I believe in the middle class and in capitalism. I believe in human beings being able to make their lives better if they have the initiative and a little help. This is one of those rare activities that benefits everyone involved.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English in Madrid, Spain.

lender.name: bonnie
lender.loan_because: My family and I have realized that purchasing material items for each other is not progressive for the larger picture of the world community. We now pool our money together once a year (for Christmas) and find a credible organization through which we can contribute.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school English teacher. I teach reading, writing, research, and critical thinking skills to inner-city high school kids.

lender.name: WordontheStreetPhotos.org
lender.occupational_info: WordontheStreetPhotos.org is dedicated to connecting and giving a voice to the growing global community of socially, environmentally, and politically conscious people.

lender.name: The Stave Family
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Brad works in marketing and communications for VisionFund International. Beccy teaches science courses at a community college. Jeremy is two and loves trains. Greta is brand new and loves milk.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: A fulfilling job is a path to happiness for many people.

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because:
because I can. because I am a woman, working hard to run my own company and want to support other women doing the same. I believe deeply in helping others help themselves.
I am thankful that i can help.

lender.name: Nate
lender.loan_because: This is where compassion seems to meet capitalism and take some of the edge off of global economics. All without government involvement. I dig that.

lender.name: Therese
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the business department of a law firm.

lender.name: pankaj & elizabeth
lender.loan_because: We would like to be abel to help as many people with a plan and as we can.
lender.occupational_info: Pankaj is an electrical engineer and Elizabeth is an opera singer.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I want to support developing businesses in developing countries. An amount of money that means very little here can be worth a great deal more somewhere else, and it only makes sense to put it to use where it will do the most good.
lender.occupational_info: I maintain computer systems, keeping them in good repair and fixing them when they fail.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: small businesses are a great source of economic stability.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the largest Professional Services Organization in the world as a Knowledge Manager.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: My cat told me to...and he was right about the dog...so, I have to think he's on to something...
lender.occupational_info: Tedious hours of boredom punctuated by moments of sheer terror.

lender.name: MIcca
lender.loan_because: To be truly human, we all should help in kindness whenever we can.

lender.name: Stuart
lender.loan_because: I have a safe and secure life working at something that started out 28 years ago as a hobby. So I am incredibly lucky. I want to spread the luck across the world. I also want my children to be involved in this work and they will join me in deciding the best use of the loan money.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an IT Project Manager in major financial institutions that make excessive profits ( larger than a lot of countries GDP )that far outweigh their importance to the world. Basically I have a good idea how to get I.T. project work organised and I tell others what to do, when to do it and then report to the big guys how well ( or badly ) we may be doing.

lender.name: Lara & Rory
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. Being comfortable is a privilege not a right.
lender.occupational_info: She works hard, he is a stay-at-home dad (and works hard too).
